h3cEponMibObjects.name: h3cEponMibObjects
h3cEponMibObjects.contactinfo: Platform Team H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip: 100085
h3cEponMibObjects.description: The objects in this MIB module are used to manage and display current configuration of Ethernet Passive Optical Network (EPON) port which are based on the Ethernet in the First Mile (EFM) Passive Optical Network(PON) as defined in IEEE Draft P802.3ah/D3.0 clause 60, 64, 65..

h3cEponAutoAuthorize.name: h3cEponAutoAuthorize
h3cEponAutoAuthorize.description: This value determines whether software performs self-authorization for each Optical Network Unit(ONU) registering to the network. Setting it to false means for every ONU registering, software requires external authorization, and until it's done the ONU is not authenticated. True value means software authorizes each ONU registering to the network automatically. true - ONUs are always authorized. false - If 802.1x authorization is enable, the ONUs have to be authorized by the protocol. - If 802.1x authorization is disable, ONUs are always authorized.

h3cEponMonitorCycle.name: h3cEponMonitorCycle
h3cEponMonitorCycle.description: The cycle of alarm thresholds checking. Applying to the following types: Bit Error Rate(BER) alarm, Frame Error Rate(FER), Logical Link Identity(LLID) mismatch alarm and so on. The unit is second.

h3cEponMsgTimeOut.name: h3cEponMsgTimeOut
h3cEponMsgTimeOut.description: Timeout waiting for a response from Optical Line Terminal(OLT) firmware after sending it a message. The unit is millisecond.

h3cEponMsgLoseNum.name: h3cEponMsgLoseNum
h3cEponMsgLoseNum.description: The times of messages sending timeouts, after which OLT will reset (applying to every OLT).

h3cEponSysHasEPONBoard.name: h3cEponSysHasEPONBoard
h3cEponSysHasEPONBoard.description: true(1) - At least an EPON board exists. false(2) - No EPON board exists.

h3cEponMonitorCycleEnable.name: h3cEponMonitorCycleEnable
h3cEponMonitorCycleEnable.description: Stop or continue monitoring. true(1) - Continue monitoring. false(2) - Stop monitoring.

h3cEponOltSoftwareErrAlmEnable.name: h3cEponOltSoftwareErrAlmEnable
h3cEponOltSoftwareErrAlmEnable.description: Software error alarm behavior of all active OLTs. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

h3cEponPortLoopBackAlmEnable.name: h3cEponPortLoopBackAlmEnable
h3cEponPortLoopBackAlmEnable.description: LoopBack alarm behavior of EPON ports. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

h3cEponMonitorCycleMinVal.name: h3cEponMonitorCycleMinVal
h3cEponMonitorCycleMinVal.description: The lower limit of cycle which be confined to the h3cEponMonitorCycle.

h3cEponMonitorCycleMaxVal.name: h3cEponMonitorCycleMaxVal
h3cEponMonitorCycleMaxVal.description: The upper limit of cycle which be confined to the h3cEponMonitorCycle.

h3cEponMsgTimeOutMinVal.name: h3cEponMsgTimeOutMinVal
h3cEponMsgTimeOutMinVal.description: The lower limit of timeout which be confined to the h3cEponMsgTimeOut.

h3cEponMsgTimeOutMaxVal.name: h3cEponMsgTimeOutMaxVal
h3cEponMsgTimeOutMaxVal.description: The upper limit of timeout which be confined to the h3cEponMsgTimeOut.

h3cEponMsgLoseNumMinVal.name: h3cEponMsgLoseNumMinVal
h3cEponMsgLoseNumMinVal.description: The lower limit of time which be confined to the h3cEponMsgLoseNum.

h3cEponMsgLoseNumMaxVal.name: h3cEponMsgLoseNumMaxVal
h3cEponMsgLoseNumMaxVal.description: The upper limit of time which be confined to the h3cEponMsgLoseNum.

h3cEponSysManTable.name: h3cEponSysManTable
h3cEponSysManTable.description: This table defines system related parameters.

h3cEponSysManEntry.name: h3cEponSysManEntry
h3cEponSysManEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cEponSysManTable.

h3cEponSlotIndex.name: h3cEponSlotIndex
h3cEponSlotIndex.description: Slot Index, the index of h3cEponSysManTable.

h3cEponModeSwitch.name: h3cEponModeSwitch
h3cEponModeSwitch.description: cmode - epon standard mode. hmode - private mode.

h3cEponAutomaticMode.name: h3cEponAutomaticMode
h3cEponAutomaticMode.description: Automatic mode setting: when enabled - after new OLT is added, the OLT stack sets its encryption mode to 'triple churning' and configure the OLT to authorize ONU MAC addresses according to its table. enable -enable automatic mode. disable -disable automatic mode.

h3cEponOamDiscoveryTimeout.name: h3cEponOamDiscoveryTimeout
h3cEponOamDiscoveryTimeout.description: Time out parameter for extended OAM discovery process message, ranging from 0 to 2550, measured in 100 milliseconds.

h3cEponEncryptionNoReplyTimeOut.name: h3cEponEncryptionNoReplyTimeOut
h3cEponEncryptionNoReplyTimeOut.description: Encryption response timeout, ranging from 1 to 2550, measured in 100 milliseconds.

h3cEponEncryptionUpdateTime.name: h3cEponEncryptionUpdateTime
h3cEponEncryptionUpdateTime.description: Encryption key update timer for all ONUs on slot, indicated by h3cEponSlotIndex, ranging from 1 to 255, measured in seconds.

h3cEponAutoBindStatus.name: h3cEponAutoBindStatus
h3cEponAutoBindStatus.description: enable - auto bind ONU ID when the ONU registered in the EPON system. disable - need manual bind ONU ID when the ONU registered in the EPON system.

h3cEponAutoUpdateTable.name: h3cEponAutoUpdateTable
h3cEponAutoUpdateTable.description: EPON auto update ONU application configuration.

h3cEponAutoUpdateEntry.name: h3cEponAutoUpdateEntry
h3cEponAutoUpdateEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cEponAutoUpdateTable.

h3cEponAutoUpdateFileName.name: h3cEponAutoUpdateFileName
h3cEponAutoUpdateFileName.description: The name of ONU application file, the file name must be valid and include the path. It is a zero length string by default.

h3cEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus.name: h3cEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus
h3cEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus.description: The status of schedule update configuration. The h3cEponAutoUpdateFileName must be set before enable h3cEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus. enable - enable ONU schedule update. disable - disable ONU schedule update.

h3cEponAutoUpdateSchedTime.name: h3cEponAutoUpdateSchedTime
h3cEponAutoUpdateSchedTime.description: The schedule update timing configuration is related to the h3cEponAutoUpdateSchedType. auto update daily: the string format is hhmm auto update weekly: the string format is hhmmw 'w' means update weekly, it ranges from 0 to 6: 0 - Sunday. 1 - Monday. 2 - Tuesday. 3 - Wednesday. 4 - Thursday. 5 - Friday. 6 - Saturday. auto update in coming date : the string format is hhmmyyyymmdd. The configuration will take effect only if h3cEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus is enabled.

h3cEponAutoUpdateSchedType.name: h3cEponAutoUpdateSchedType
h3cEponAutoUpdateSchedType.description: The update type of auto updating configuration. daily - update ONU application every day. weekly - update ONU application every week. comingdate - update ONU application on coming date.

h3cEponAutoUpdateRealTimeStatus.name: h3cEponAutoUpdateRealTimeStatus
h3cEponAutoUpdateRealTimeStatus.description: The status of real time update configuration. The h3cEponAutoUpdateFileName must be set before enable h3cEponAutoUpdateRealTimeStatus. enable - enable ONU real time update. disable - disable ONU real time update.

h3cEponOuiIndexNextEntry.name: h3cEponOuiIndexNextEntry
h3cEponOuiIndexNextEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cEponOuiIndexNextTable.

h3cEponOuiIndexNext.name: h3cEponOuiIndexNext
h3cEponOuiIndexNext.description: This object contains an appropriate value to be used for h3cEponOuiIndex when creating rows in the h3cEponOuiTable.

h3cEponOuiTable.name: h3cEponOuiTable
h3cEponOuiTable.description: List of OUI and OAM supported by OLT.

h3cEponOuiEntry.name: h3cEponOuiEntry
h3cEponOuiEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cEponOuiTable.

h3cEponOuiValue.name: h3cEponOuiValue
h3cEponOuiValue.description: OUI list supported by the extended OAM discovery process. The OUI is composed of six octets. The first six octets denote the first OUI , the second six octets denote the second OUI, and the like.

h3cEponOamVersion.name: h3cEponOamVersion
h3cEponOamVersion.description: Version of OAM protocol defined by the organization denoted by OUI.

h3cEponOuiRowStatus.name: h3cEponOuiRowStatus
h3cEponOuiRowStatus.description: The status of this table entry. Only active, createAndGo and the destory are supported.

h3cEponMulticastControlEntry.name: h3cEponMulticastControlEntry
h3cEponMulticastControlEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cEponMulticastControlTable.

h3cEponMulticastAddressList.name: h3cEponMulticastAddressList
h3cEponMulticastAddressList.description: The multicast address, each four octets represents a multicast address, the address section ranging from the first four octets to the second four octets, and the like.

h3cEponMulticastStatus.name: h3cEponMulticastStatus
h3cEponMulticastStatus.description: The status of this table entry. Only active, createAndGo and the destory are supported.

h3cEponDbaUpdateFileName.name: h3cEponDbaUpdateFileName
h3cEponDbaUpdateFileName.description: The name of a binary file which is loaded to the OLT from an external source. Note that the filename must contain the file path.

h3cEponOnuUpdateFileName.name: h3cEponOnuUpdateFileName
h3cEponOnuUpdateFileName.description: The filename of the ONU firmware to be updated. Note that the filename must contain the file path.

h3cOltSysManTable.name: h3cOltSysManTable
h3cOltSysManTable.description: This table defines several OLT system parameters: (1)laser on time (2)laser off time (3)whether multiple copy broadcast (4)whether discard packet (5)self test (6)self test result

h3cOltSysManEntry.name: h3cOltSysManEntry
h3cOltSysManEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cOltSysManTable.

h3cOltLaserOnTime.name: h3cOltLaserOnTime
h3cOltLaserOnTime.description: The laser on time of the ONUs during the discovery process, measured in Time Quanta(TQ).

h3cOltLaserOffTime.name: h3cOltLaserOffTime
h3cOltLaserOffTime.description: The laser off time of the ONUs during the discovery process, measured in TQ.

h3cOltMultiCopyBrdCast.name: h3cOltMultiCopyBrdCast
h3cOltMultiCopyBrdCast.description: true/false filtering of tagged multicast frames. The software avert tagged downstream frames with multicast or broadcast DA to the PON and not to the CPU, except for special multicast frames (link-constraint, IGMP control and ARP) that are passed to the CPU regardless of this feature.

h3cOltEnableDiscardPacket.name: h3cOltEnableDiscardPacket
h3cOltEnableDiscardPacket.description: Forward(false)/discard(true) any frames received from unlearned source address when the inside address table of the original ONU entry reach to the limit.

h3cOltSelfTest.name: h3cOltSelfTest
h3cOltSelfTest.description: selftest(1): Test OLT to check whether it's OK.

h3cOltSelfTestResult.name: h3cOltSelfTestResult
h3cOltSelfTestResult.description: The self test result of the specific OLT. other(1): The self test result is another reason. ok(2): The self test result is OK. fail(3): The self test result is fail.

h3cOltMaxRtt.name: h3cOltMaxRtt
h3cOltMaxRtt.description: Set the max Round Trip Time of this OLT.

h3cOltInfoTable.name: h3cOltInfoTable
h3cOltInfoTable.description: Primary status of the specified OLT. There will be one row in this table for each information in the system. (1)Software and hardware versions of the specified OLT (h3cOltFirmMajorVersion, h3cOltFirmMinorVersion, h3cOltHardMajorVersion, h3cOltHardMinorVersion) (2)Several physical capabilities of an OLT device. (h3cOltAgcLockTime, h3cOltAgcCdrTime) (3)The operation(activation) status of an OLT. (h3cOltMacAddress, h3cOltWorkMode)

h3cOltInfoEntry.name: h3cOltInfoEntry
h3cOltInfoEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cOltInfoTable.

h3cOltFirmMajorVersion.name: h3cOltFirmMajorVersion
h3cOltFirmMajorVersion.description: OLT firmware major version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

h3cOltFirmMinorVersion.name: h3cOltFirmMinorVersion
h3cOltFirmMinorVersion.description: OLT firmware minor version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

h3cOltHardMajorVersion.name: h3cOltHardMajorVersion
h3cOltHardMajorVersion.description: OLT hardware major version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

h3cOltHardMinorVersion.name: h3cOltHardMinorVersion
h3cOltHardMinorVersion.description: OLT hardware minor version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

h3cOltAgcLockTime.name: h3cOltAgcLockTime
h3cOltAgcLockTime.description: PON upstream data Automatic Gain Control(AGC) lock time, measured in TQ, range: 1 - 2^15. 0x7FFFFFFF: unknown value.

h3cOltAgcCdrTime.name: h3cOltAgcCdrTime
h3cOltAgcCdrTime.description: PON RX signal synchronization time, measured in TQ, range: 1 - 2^15. 0x7FFFFFFF: unknown value

h3cOltWorkMode.name: h3cOltWorkMode
h3cOltWorkMode.description: The operation(activation) modes of an OLT. other(1) - The OLT is in another mode. open(2) - The OLT is open. reset(3) - The OLT is reset. closed(4) - The OLT is closed.

h3cOltOpticalPowerTx.name: h3cOltOpticalPowerTx
h3cOltOpticalPowerTx.description: The optical power transmitted by this OLT. It measured in 0.01 dBm unit.

h3cOltOpticalPowerRx.name: h3cOltOpticalPowerRx
h3cOltOpticalPowerRx.description: The burst optical power received by this OLT. It measured in 0.01 dBm unit.

h3cOltDbaManTable.name: h3cOltDbaManTable
h3cOltDbaManTable.description: This table defines the primary parameters of the Dynamic Bandwidth Allocation(DBA) algorithm applying to the OLT.

h3cOltDbaManEntry.name: h3cOltDbaManEntry
h3cOltDbaManEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cOltDbaManTable.

h3cOltDbaEnabledType.name: h3cOltDbaEnabledType
h3cOltDbaEnabledType.description: Enable different types of the DBA algorithm. Start upstream dynamic bandwidth allocation algorithm, replacing former bandwidth allocation mechanism. internal(1) - OLT internal Service Level Agreement(SLA) based algorithm, always being activated. external(2) - DBA algorithm in a binary file which is loaded to the OLT from an external source.

h3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequency.name: h3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequency
h3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequency.description: How often should the OLT send discovery frames to the ONUs, measured in grant cycles.

h3cOltDbaCycleLength.name: h3cOltDbaCycleLength
h3cOltDbaCycleLength.description: The grant cycle length in TQ units.

h3cOltDbaUpdate.name: h3cOltDbaUpdate
h3cOltDbaUpdate.description: Update(1): Update the DBA algorithm with a binary file which is loaded to the OLT from an external source(flash). Config the MIB object module h3cEponDbaUpdateFileName.

h3cOltDbaUpdateResult.name: h3cOltDbaUpdateResult
h3cOltDbaUpdateResult.description: The latest DBA update result. other: The DBA update result is another reason. ok: The DBA update result is OK. fail: The DBA update result is fail. fileNotExist: The DBA update failed because the file does not exist. notSetFilename: The DBA filename is not set.

h3cOltPortAlarmThresholdTable.name: h3cOltPortAlarmThresholdTable
h3cOltPortAlarmThresholdTable.description: The table defines the alarm threshold of OLT.

h3cOltPortAlarmThresholdEntry.name: h3cOltPortAlarmThresholdEntry
h3cOltPortAlarmThresholdEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cOltPortAlarmThresholdTable.

h3cOltPortAlarmBerEnabled.name: h3cOltPortAlarmBerEnabled
h3cOltPortAlarmBerEnabled.description: Behavior of BER alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

h3cOltPortAlarmBerDirect.name: h3cOltPortAlarmBerDirect
h3cOltPortAlarmBerDirect.description: Traffic direction to monitor for BER alarm.

h3cOltPortAlarmBerThreshold.name: h3cOltPortAlarmBerThreshold
h3cOltPortAlarmBerThreshold.description: BER threshold exceed which the alarm is raised.

h3cOltPortAlarmFerEnabled.name: h3cOltPortAlarmFerEnabled
h3cOltPortAlarmFerEnabled.description: Behavior of FER alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

h3cOltPortAlarmFerDirect.name: h3cOltPortAlarmFerDirect
h3cOltPortAlarmFerDirect.description: Traffic direction to monitor for FER alarm.

h3cOltPortAlarmFerThreshold.name: h3cOltPortAlarmFerThreshold
h3cOltPortAlarmFerThreshold.description: Frame error rate exceed threshold then the alarm is raised.

h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchEnabled.name: h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchEnabled
h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchEnabled.description: Behavior of LLID mismatch alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold.name: h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold
h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold.description: The minimal number of mismatched frames exceed threshold then LLID mismatch alarm is raised.

h3cOltPortAlarmRemoteStableEnabled.name: h3cOltPortAlarmRemoteStableEnabled
h3cOltPortAlarmRemoteStableEnabled.description: Behavior of remote stable alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

h3cOltPortAlarmLocalStableEnabled.name: h3cOltPortAlarmLocalStableEnabled
h3cOltPortAlarmLocalStableEnabled.description: Behavior of local stable alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

h3cOltPortAlarmRegistrationEnabled.name: h3cOltPortAlarmRegistrationEnabled
h3cOltPortAlarmRegistrationEnabled.description: Behavior of registration alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

h3cOltPortAlarmOamDisconnectionEnabled.name: h3cOltPortAlarmOamDisconnectionEnabled
h3cOltPortAlarmOamDisconnectionEnabled.description: Behavior of Operations Administration and Maintenance(OAM) disconnection alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

h3cOltPortAlarmEncryptionKeyEnabled.name: h3cOltPortAlarmEncryptionKeyEnabled
h3cOltPortAlarmEncryptionKeyEnabled.description: Behavior of encryption bad key alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

h3cOltPortAlarmVendorSpecificEnabled.name: h3cOltPortAlarmVendorSpecificEnabled
h3cOltPortAlarmVendorSpecificEnabled.description: Behavior of vendor specific alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

h3cOltPortAlarmRegExcessEnabled.name: h3cOltPortAlarmRegExcessEnabled
h3cOltPortAlarmRegExcessEnabled.description: Behavior of ONU registering over limitation alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

h3cOltPortAlarmDFEEnabled.name: h3cOltPortAlarmDFEEnabled
h3cOltPortAlarmDFEEnabled.description: Behavior of device fatal error alarm. true - alarm enable. false - alarm disable.

h3cOltLaserOnTimeMinVal.name: h3cOltLaserOnTimeMinVal
h3cOltLaserOnTimeMinVal.description: The lower limit of time which is confined to h3cOltLaserOnTime.

h3cOltLaserOnTimeMaxVal.name: h3cOltLaserOnTimeMaxVal
h3cOltLaserOnTimeMaxVal.description: The upper limit of time which is confined to h3cOltLaserOnTime.

h3cOltLaserOffTimeMinVal.name: h3cOltLaserOffTimeMinVal
h3cOltLaserOffTimeMinVal.description: The lower limit of time which is confined to h3cOltLaserOffTime.

h3cOltLaserOffTimeMaxVal.name: h3cOltLaserOffTimeMaxVal
h3cOltLaserOffTimeMaxVal.description: The upper limit of time which is confined to h3cOltLaserOffTime.

h3cOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMinVal.name: h3cOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMinVal
h3cOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMinVal.description: The lower limit of the discovery length which is confined to h3cOltDbaDiscoveryLength.

h3cOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMaxVal.name: h3cOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMaxVal
h3cOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMaxVal.description: The upper limit of the discovery length which is confined to h3cOltDbaDiscoveryLength.

h3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMinVal.name: h3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMinVal
h3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMinVal.description: The lower limit of the discovery length which is confined to h3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequency.

h3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMaxVal.name: h3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMaxVal
h3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMaxVal.description: The upper limit of the discovery length which is confined to h3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequency.

h3cOltDbaCycleLengthMinVal.name: h3cOltDbaCycleLengthMinVal
h3cOltDbaCycleLengthMinVal.description: The lower limit of the frames which is confined to h3cOltDbaCycleLength.

h3cOltDbaCycleLengthMaxVal.name: h3cOltDbaCycleLengthMaxVal
h3cOltDbaCycleLengthMaxVal.description: The upper limit of the frames which is confined to h3cOltDbaCycleLength.

h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisMinVal.name: h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisMinVal
h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisMinVal.description: The lower limit of the frames which is confined to h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold.

h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisMaxVal.name: h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisMaxVal
h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisMaxVal.description: The upper limit of the frames which is confined to h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold.

h3cOltPortAlarmBerMinVal.name: h3cOltPortAlarmBerMinVal
h3cOltPortAlarmBerMinVal.description: The lower limit of threshold which is confined to h3cOltPortAlarmBerThreshold.

h3cOltPortAlarmBerMaxVal.name: h3cOltPortAlarmBerMaxVal
h3cOltPortAlarmBerMaxVal.description: The upper limit of threshold which is confined to h3cOltPortAlarmBerThreshold.

h3cOltPortAlarmFerMinVal.name: h3cOltPortAlarmFerMinVal
h3cOltPortAlarmFerMinVal.description: The lower limit of threshold which is confined to h3cOltPortAlarmFerThreshold.

h3cOltPortAlarmFerMaxVal.name: h3cOltPortAlarmFerMaxVal
h3cOltPortAlarmFerMaxVal.description: The upper limit of threshold which is confined to h3cOltPortAlarmFerThreshold.

h3cOnuSilentTable.name: h3cOnuSilentTable
h3cOnuSilentTable.description: This table is used for getting silent ONU information of OLT.

h3cOnuSilentEntry.name: h3cOnuSilentEntry
h3cOnuSilentEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cOnuSilentTable.

h3cOnuSilentMacAddr.name: h3cOnuSilentMacAddr
h3cOnuSilentMacAddr.description: The MAC address of silent ONUs in OLT.

h3cOnuSilentTime.name: h3cOnuSilentTime
h3cOnuSilentTime.description: The aging time of a silent ONU.

h3cOltUsingOnuTable.name: h3cOltUsingOnuTable
h3cOltUsingOnuTable.description: The table containing configurations to manage ONU interface(s) based on OLT interface.

h3cOltUsingOnuEntry.name: h3cOltUsingOnuEntry
h3cOltUsingOnuEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cOltUsingOnuTable.

h3cOltUsingOnuNum.name: h3cOltUsingOnuNum
h3cOltUsingOnuNum.description: The ONU interface number. This value is used to specify the ONU interface which the user wants to configure for an OLT interface.

h3cOltUsingOnuIfIndex.name: h3cOltUsingOnuIfIndex
h3cOltUsingOnuIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of the ONU interface.

h3cOltUsingOnuRowStatus.name: h3cOltUsingOnuRowStatus
h3cOltUsingOnuRowStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation, deletion and modification of rows, which supports active status and CreatAndGo, destroy operation.

h3cOnuSysManTable.name: h3cOnuSysManTable
h3cOnuSysManTable.description: This table implements the following functions for ONUs: 1. Encrypting all downstream/upstream and downstream directions traffic destined to and originated from a specific LLID (ONU in current implementation). 2. Restart a process of ONU authentication, using the OLT (IEEE 802.1x) authenticator.

h3cOnuSysManEntry.name: h3cOnuSysManEntry
h3cOnuSysManEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cOnuSysManTable.

h3cOnuEncryptMan.name: h3cOnuEncryptMan
h3cOnuEncryptMan.description: Start encrypting all downstream/upstream and downstream directions traffic destined to and originated from a specific LLID (ONU in current implementation). ONU registration encryption key is used as an initial value. If the encryption key was updated after ONU registration, the last updated key is used. off(1): - Stop encrypting. downlink(2): - Start encrypting all downstream directions traffic. updownlink(3): - Start encrypting all downstream/upstream directions traffic.

h3cOnuReAuthorize.name: h3cOnuReAuthorize
h3cOnuReAuthorize.description: Restart a process of ONU authentication. If 802.1x authentication is enabled, the OLT (IEEE 802.1x) authenticator is applied. Otherwise, use the default authentication. Until the reauthentication succeeds, the ONU remains its previous authorization mode. The reauthentication process includes a new authentication request sent to the authentication server.

h3cOnuMulticastFilterStatus.name: h3cOnuMulticastFilterStatus
h3cOnuMulticastFilterStatus.description: true(1) - Multicast-Filter enable on ONU. false(2) - Multicast-Filter disable on ONU.

h3cOnuDbaReportQueueSetNumber.name: h3cOnuDbaReportQueueSetNumber
h3cOnuDbaReportQueueSetNumber.description: The number of queue sets reported in MPCP report frames.

h3cOnuRemoteFecStatus.name: h3cOnuRemoteFecStatus
h3cOnuRemoteFecStatus.description: Value that indicates status of the 1000BASE-PX PHY optional FEC Sublayer for forward error correction see [802.3ah] clause 65.2. enable - enable remote forward error correction. disable - disable remote forward error correction.

h3cOnuPortBerStatus.name: h3cOnuPortBerStatus
h3cOnuPortBerStatus.description: enable - enable ONU port bit error rate alarm. disable - disable ONU port bit error rate alarm.

h3cOnuMulticastControlMode.name: h3cOnuMulticastControlMode
h3cOnuMulticastControlMode.description: igmpsnooping - the traditional IGMP snooping mode. multicastcontrol - the specific multicast control mode.

h3cOnuAccessVlan.name: h3cOnuAccessVlan
h3cOnuAccessVlan.description: The VLAN ID assigned to untagged frames received on ONU.

h3cOnuEncryptKey.name: h3cOnuEncryptKey
h3cOnuEncryptKey.description: The encryption key, used to encrypt all downstream traffic destined to and/or upstream traffic originating from a specific ONU. It is a zero length, or MD5 hashed string, by default, the string is empty.

h3cOnuUniUpDownTrapStatus.name: h3cOnuUniUpDownTrapStatus
h3cOnuUniUpDownTrapStatus.description: true - A notification will be sent when UNI link status is change. false - Device will not sent notification when UNI link status is change.

h3cOnuFecStatus.name: h3cOnuFecStatus
h3cOnuFecStatus.description: Value that indicates status of the 1000BASE-PX PHY optional FEC Sublayer for forward error correction (include remote onu and local OLT) see [802.3ah] clause 65.2 enable - enable forward error correction. disable - disable forward error correction.

h3cOnuMcastCtrlHostAgingTime.name: h3cOnuMcastCtrlHostAgingTime
h3cOnuMcastCtrlHostAgingTime.description: The host aging time of multicast control mode on ONU, ranging from 200 to 1000, measured in seconds.

h3cOnuMulticastFastLeaveEnable.name: h3cOnuMulticastFastLeaveEnable
h3cOnuMulticastFastLeaveEnable.description: true(1) - Enable multicast fast leave attribute on all ethernet UNIs of the ONU. false(2) - Disable multicast fast leave attribute on all ethernet UNIs of the ONU.

h3cOnuPortIsolateEnable.name: h3cOnuPortIsolateEnable
h3cOnuPortIsolateEnable.description: true(1) - Enable port isolate setting on all ethernet UNIs of the ONU. false(2) - Disable port isolate setting on all ethernet UNIs of the ONU.

h3cOnuLinkTestTable.name: h3cOnuLinkTestTable
h3cOnuLinkTestTable.description: LLID link test applying to the ONU only including delay measurement option. The command tests a link to a single LLID over a period of time or once, using a variable number of measurement frames. The length of the measurement frames is also parameterized. The test uses a loopback mode of the ONU to return each measurement frame, loopback activation is done using randomly patterned OAM Protocol Data Unit(PDU) frames.

h3cOnuLinkTestFrameSize.name: h3cOnuLinkTestFrameSize
h3cOnuLinkTestFrameSize.description: Measurement frames data size, measured in bytes. Not including Preamble, SFD, VLAN tag, and FCS. Frame size minimum value is 56 - if VLAN tag is enabled('VLAN enable' field is set to ENABLE), and 60 - if VLAN tag is disabled. The actual measurement frames sent to the PON are always minimum 60 bytes long. When VLAN tag is enabled, the actual measurement frames size including FCS may reach (1514+4+4=)1522 bytes. 60(60 is VLAN tag disabled) - 1514 .

h3cOnuLinkTestDelay.name: h3cOnuLinkTestDelay
h3cOnuLinkTestDelay.description: true:Link test includes delay measurement, which corresponds to the difference between sent and received times(including granting delay and firmware processing time overheads). false:Link test not includes a delay measurement.

h3cOnuLinkTestVlanTag.name: h3cOnuLinkTestVlanTag
h3cOnuLinkTestVlanTag.description: true:Enable VLAN tag in link test frames. false:Link test not includes frames with VLAN tag.

h3cOnuLinkTestResultSentFrameNum.name: h3cOnuLinkTestResultSentFrameNum
h3cOnuLinkTestResultSentFrameNum.description: The total number of frames sent during the link test process.

h3cOnuLinkTestResultRetFrameNum.name: h3cOnuLinkTestResultRetFrameNum
h3cOnuLinkTestResultRetFrameNum.description: The total number of frames return back during the link test process.

h3cOnuLinkTestResultRetErrFrameNum.name: h3cOnuLinkTestResultRetErrFrameNum
h3cOnuLinkTestResultRetErrFrameNum.description: The total number of error frames return back during the link test process.

h3cOnuLinkTestResultMinDelay.name: h3cOnuLinkTestResultMinDelay
h3cOnuLinkTestResultMinDelay.description: The minimum delay time in TQ units, which corresponds to the difference between sent and received times (including granting delay and firmware processing time overheads). It's invalid if the field 'h3cOnuLinkTestDelay' is set to be true.

h3cOnuLinkTestResultMeanDelay.name: h3cOnuLinkTestResultMeanDelay
h3cOnuLinkTestResultMeanDelay.description: The average delay time in TQ units, which corresponds to the difference between sent and received times (including granting delay and firmware processing time overheads). It's invalid if the field 'h3cOnuLinkTestDelay' is set to be true.

h3cOnuLinkTestResultMaxDelay.name: h3cOnuLinkTestResultMaxDelay
h3cOnuLinkTestResultMaxDelay.description: The maximum delay time in TQ units, which corresponds to the difference between sent and received times (including granting delay and firmware processing time overheads). It's invalid if the field 'h3cOnuLinkTestDelay' is set to be true.

h3cOnuBandWidthTable.name: h3cOnuBandWidthTable
h3cOnuBandWidthTable.description: Set bandwidth policy parameters(restrictions)for a LLID (only for the ONU). Default policies are set to disable. Policy parameters will be erased upon LLID network disconnection.

h3cOnuDownStreamBandWidthPolicy.name: h3cOnuDownStreamBandWidthPolicy
h3cOnuDownStreamBandWidthPolicy.description: true:Enable static bandwidth configuration policing. false:Disable static bandwidth configuration policing.

h3cOnuDownStreamMaxBandWidth.name: h3cOnuDownStreamMaxBandWidth
h3cOnuDownStreamMaxBandWidth.description: Maximum bandwidth allowed for the ONU, measured in Kbits/Sec.

h3cOnuDownStreamMaxBurstSize.name: h3cOnuDownStreamMaxBurstSize
h3cOnuDownStreamMaxBurstSize.description: Maximal number of bytes in a burst. The value is truncated to the nearest smaller 128 bytes multiple value, measured in bytes.

h3cOnuDownStreamHighPriorityFirst.name: h3cOnuDownStreamHighPriorityFirst
h3cOnuDownStreamHighPriorityFirst.description: true:Enable high priority frames preference. false:Disable high priority frames preference.

h3cOnuDownStreamShortFrameFirst.name: h3cOnuDownStreamShortFrameFirst
h3cOnuDownStreamShortFrameFirst.description: true:Enable short frames preference. false:Disable short frames preference.

h3cOnuP2PBandWidthPolicy.name: h3cOnuP2PBandWidthPolicy
h3cOnuP2PBandWidthPolicy.description: true:Enable static bandwidth configuration policing. false:Disable static bandwidth configuration policing.

h3cOnuP2PMaxBandWidth.name: h3cOnuP2PMaxBandWidth
h3cOnuP2PMaxBandWidth.description: Maximum bandwidth allowed for the ONU, measured in Kbits/Sec.

h3cOnuP2PMaxBurstSize.name: h3cOnuP2PMaxBurstSize
h3cOnuP2PMaxBurstSize.description: Maximal number of bytes in a burst. The value is truncated to the nearest smaller 128 bytes multiple value, measured in bytes.

h3cOnuP2PHighPriorityFirst.name: h3cOnuP2PHighPriorityFirst
h3cOnuP2PHighPriorityFirst.description: true:Enable high priority frames preference. false:Disable high priority frames preference.

h3cOnuP2PShortFrameFirst.name: h3cOnuP2PShortFrameFirst
h3cOnuP2PShortFrameFirst.description: true:Enable short frames preference. false:Disable short frames preference.

h3cOnuSlaManTable.name: h3cOnuSlaManTable
h3cOnuSlaManTable.description: Two types of DBA algorithm are supported in the ONU. The internal SLA based algorithm is always activated. This table defines the primary parameter about the internal SLA algorithm.

h3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidth.name: h3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidth
h3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidth.description: Maximum bandwidth - measured in Kbit/s. The value of this object should be the multiple of the value of h3cOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal. The minimum bandwidth should not be larger than the maximum bandwidth.

h3cOnuSlaMinBandWidth.name: h3cOnuSlaMinBandWidth
h3cOnuSlaMinBandWidth.description: Minimum bandwidth - measured in Kbit/s. The value of this object should be the multiple of the value of h3cOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal. The maximum bandwidth should be larger than the minimum bandwidth.

h3cOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal.name: h3cOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal
h3cOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal.description: Granularity of bandwidth - measured in Kbit/s. The value of h3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidth and h3cOnuSlaMinBandWidth should be the multiple of the value of this object.

h3cOnuSlaDelay.name: h3cOnuSlaDelay
h3cOnuSlaDelay.description: low - low delay. high - high delay. The delay constraint of a specific ONU. Set to high may improve the bandwidth usage at the cost of delay.

h3cOnuSlaFixedBandWidth.name: h3cOnuSlaFixedBandWidth
h3cOnuSlaFixedBandWidth.description: Fixed bandwidth - measured in Kbit/s. The value of this object should be the multiple of the value of h3cOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal.

h3cOnuSlaPriorityClass.name: h3cOnuSlaPriorityClass
h3cOnuSlaPriorityClass.description: Precedence of this flow over others in case of contention. 0 is the lowest priority and 7 is the highest priority.

h3cOnuSlaFixedPacketSize.name: h3cOnuSlaFixedPacketSize
h3cOnuSlaFixedPacketSize.description: Fixed packet size - measured in byte. The value of this object should be valid when h3cOnuSlaFixedBandWidth is configured.

h3cOnuInfoTable.name: h3cOnuInfoTable
h3cOnuInfoTable.description: Primary status of the specified ONU. There will be one row in this table for each information in the system. (1)Software and hardware versions of the specified ONU (h3cOnuHardMajorVersion, h3cOnuHardMinorVersion, h3cOnuUniMacType) (2)Several physical capabilities of the ONU. (h3cOnuLaserOnTime, h3cOnuLaserOffTime, h3cOnuGrantFifoDep.) (3)The operation(activation) status of the ONU. (h3cOnuWorkMode)

h3cOnuHardMajorVersion.name: h3cOnuHardMajorVersion
h3cOnuHardMajorVersion.description: ONU hardware major version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

h3cOnuHardMinorVersion.name: h3cOnuHardMinorVersion
h3cOnuHardMinorVersion.description: ONU hardware minor version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

h3cOnuUniMacType.name: h3cOnuUniMacType
h3cOnuUniMacType.description: ONU User Network Interface(UNI) port MAC type.

h3cOnuLaserOnTime.name: h3cOnuLaserOnTime
h3cOnuLaserOnTime.description: The ONU laser on time measured in TQ units. If the object value is 0x7FFFFFFF, it means h3cOnuLaserOnTime is unknown.

h3cOnuLaserOffTime.name: h3cOnuLaserOffTime
h3cOnuLaserOffTime.description: The ONU laser off time measured in TQ units. If the object value is 0x7FFFFFFF, it means h3cOnuLaserOffTime is unknown.

h3cOnuGrantFifoDep.name: h3cOnuGrantFifoDep
h3cOnuGrantFifoDep.description: Maximal number of grant records an ONU can store, relevant to ONU only. range: 1 - 255. 0x7FFFFFFF: unknown value.

h3cOnuWorkMode.name: h3cOnuWorkMode
h3cOnuWorkMode.description: The operation(activation) mode of an ONU. other(1) - ONU is in another mode. on(2) - ONU is registered and authorized to the network. In this mode it works as a media converter. pending(3) - ONU has been registered to the PON, but not authorized to the network. off(4) - ONU is not registered to the network.

h3cOnuDistance.name: h3cOnuDistance
h3cOnuDistance.description: The distance between OLT and ONU, measured in meter.

h3cOnuLlid.name: h3cOnuLlid
h3cOnuLlid.description: The link layer identifier, which uniquely identifies the ONU of a specific OLT.

h3cOnuOpticalPowerReceivedByOlt.name: h3cOnuOpticalPowerReceivedByOlt
h3cOnuOpticalPowerReceivedByOlt.description: The burst ONU optical power received by OLT, and when the ONU status is up the value is usable. It measured in 0.01 dBm unit.

h3cOnuMacAddrInfoTable.name: h3cOnuMacAddrInfoTable
h3cOnuMacAddrInfoTable.description: This table used for getting MAC address information of ONU.

h3cOnuMacIndex.name: h3cOnuMacIndex
h3cOnuMacIndex.description: The index of ONUs in one OLT.

h3cOnuMacAddrFlag.name: h3cOnuMacAddrFlag
h3cOnuMacAddrFlag.description: The flag of ONU status. 1 - bound:The ONU is bound but not registered. 2 - registered:The ONU is registered but not bound. 3 - run:The ONU is registered and bound on one OLT. 4 - regIncorrect:The ONU is bound on one OLT and registered on another OLT.

h3cOnuBindMacAddrTable.name: h3cOnuBindMacAddrTable
h3cOnuBindMacAddrTable.description: This table implements the following functions for ONUs: Bind MAC of ONU.

h3cOnuBindMacAddrEntry.name: h3cOnuBindMacAddrEntry
h3cOnuBindMacAddrEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cOnuBindMacAddrTable.

h3cOnuBindMacAddress.name: h3cOnuBindMacAddress
h3cOnuBindMacAddress.description: Bind the MAC of ONU. While the MAC is not bound, the ONU can not go into effect and configurations can not be set. Set 0-0-0 (MAC address) to the EPON device port will unbind the relationship with the original MAC and configurations will be set to default values.

h3cOnuBindType.name: h3cOnuBindType
h3cOnuBindType.description: Set the binding type with the ONU which is confined to the index of h3cEponOnuTypeDescr.

h3cOnuFirmwareUpdateTable.name: h3cOnuFirmwareUpdateTable
h3cOnuFirmwareUpdateTable.description: This table implements the following functions for ONUs: 1. Update the ONU firmware. 2. Result of update ONU firmware.

h3cOnuFirmwareUpdateEntry.name: h3cOnuFirmwareUpdateEntry
h3cOnuFirmwareUpdateEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cOnuFirmwareUpdateTable.

h3cOnuUpdate.name: h3cOnuUpdate
h3cOnuUpdate.description: update(1): Update the ONU firmware. Config the MIB object module h3cEponOnuUpdateFileName with the filename of ONU firmware first.

h3cOnuUpdateResult.name: h3cOnuUpdateResult
h3cOnuUpdateResult.description: The ONU firmware update result. updating - The ONU is updating firmware right now. ok - The ONU update result is OK. fail - The ONU update result is fail. fileNotExist - The ONU update failed because the file does not exist. notSetFilename - The ONU firmware filename is not set. fileNotMatchONU - The ONU firmware does not match the ONU. timeout - The ONU responses timeout. otherError - The ONU update result is unknown.

h3cOnuUpdateFileName.name: h3cOnuUpdateFileName
h3cOnuUpdateFileName.description: The filename of the ONU firmware to be updated. Note that the filename must contain the file path.

h3cOnuLinkTestFrameNumMinVal.name: h3cOnuLinkTestFrameNumMinVal
h3cOnuLinkTestFrameNumMinVal.description: The lower limit of measurement frames which is confined to h3cOnuLinkTestFrameNum.

h3cOnuLinkTestFrameNumMaxVal.name: h3cOnuLinkTestFrameNumMaxVal
h3cOnuLinkTestFrameNumMaxVal.description: The upper limit of measurement frames which is confined to h3cOnuLinkTestFrameNum.

h3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMinVal.name: h3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMinVal
h3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMinVal.description: The lower limit of maximum-bandwidth which is confined to h3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidth.

h3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMaxVal.name: h3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMaxVal
h3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMaxVal.description: The upper limit of maximum-bandwidth which is confined to h3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidth.

h3cOnuSlaMinBandWidthMinVal.name: h3cOnuSlaMinBandWidthMinVal
h3cOnuSlaMinBandWidthMinVal.description: The lower limit of minimum-bandwidth which is confined to h3cOnuSlaMinBandWidth.

h3cOnuSlaMinBandWidthMaxVal.name: h3cOnuSlaMinBandWidthMaxVal
h3cOnuSlaMinBandWidthMaxVal.description: The upper limit of minimum-bandwidth which is confined to h3cOnuSlaMinBandWidth.

h3cEponOnuTypeManTable.name: h3cEponOnuTypeManTable
h3cEponOnuTypeManTable.description: This table is used for getting ONU bind type in current version.

h3cEponOnuTypeDescr.name: h3cEponOnuTypeDescr
h3cEponOnuTypeDescr.description: The ONU type description which can be used to bind ONU in current version. the value of h3cOnuBindType can be configured by the index of h3cEponOnuTypeDescr.

h3cOnuPacketManTable.name: h3cOnuPacketManTable
h3cOnuPacketManTable.description: This table implements the following functions: (1)Manage packet priority trust mode. (2)Manage packet queue-scheduler mode.

h3cOnuPriorityTrust.name: h3cOnuPriorityTrust
h3cOnuPriorityTrust.description: The QOS mode which is assigned on ONU. dscp - The service dscp of politic Priority. ipprecedence - The service IP precedence of politic Priority. cos - The service cos of politic Priority.

h3cOnuQueueScheduler.name: h3cOnuQueueScheduler
h3cOnuQueueScheduler.description: The packet queue-scheduler mode which is assigned on ONU. spq - strict priority queuing. wfq - specifies the weights for weighted round-robin queuing.

h3cOnuProtocolTable.name: h3cOnuProtocolTable
h3cOnuProtocolTable.description: This table implements the following functions: (1)Manage STP status. (2)Manage IGMP-snooping. (3)Manage DHCP-snooping.

h3cOnuStpStatus.name: h3cOnuStpStatus
h3cOnuStpStatus.description: true(1) - STP status enable on ONU. false(2) - STP status disable on ONU.

h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingStatus.name: h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingStatus
h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingStatus.description: true(1) - IGMP snooping status enable on ONU. false(2) - IGMP snooping status disable on ONU.

h3cOnuDhcpsnoopingOption82.name: h3cOnuDhcpsnoopingOption82
h3cOnuDhcpsnoopingOption82.description: true(1) - DHCP snooping Option 82 status enable on ONU. false(2) - DHCP snooping Option 82 status disable on ONU.

h3cOnuDhcpsnooping.name: h3cOnuDhcpsnooping
h3cOnuDhcpsnooping.description: true(1) - DHCP snooping status enable on ONU. false(2) - DHCP snooping status disable on ONU.

h3cOnuPppoe.name: h3cOnuPppoe
h3cOnuPppoe.description: true(1) - PPPOE status enable on ONU. false(2) - PPPOE status disable on ONU.

h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingHostAgingT.name: h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingHostAgingT
h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingHostAgingT.description: Set the host aging time of IGMP on ONU.

h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingMaxRespT.name: h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingMaxRespT
h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingMaxRespT.description: Set the max response time of IGMP on ONU.

h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingRouterAgingT.name: h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingRouterAgingT
h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingRouterAgingT.description: Set the router aging time of IGMP on ONU.

h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingAggReportS.name: h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingAggReportS
h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingAggReportS.description: true(1) - Igmp snooping aggregation report status enable on ONU. false(2) - Igmp snooping aggregation report status disable on ONU.

h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingAggLeaveS.name: h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingAggLeaveS
h3cOnuIgmpSnoopingAggLeaveS.description: true(1) - Igmp snooping aggregation leave status enable on ONU. false(2) - Igmp snooping aggregation leave status disable on ONU.

h3cOnuDot1xTable.name: h3cOnuDot1xTable
h3cOnuDot1xTable.description: This table implements the following functions: (1)Manage 802.1x account. (2)Manage 802.1x password. ONU will be authorized to send and receive frames when the account and the password are all right, otherwise this ONU will be unavailable.

h3cOnuDot1xAccount.name: h3cOnuDot1xAccount
h3cOnuDot1xAccount.description: ONU 802.1X account. The object value cannot be set as 'a', 'al' or 'all'. The object should be set together with h3cOnuDot1xPassword.

h3cOnuDot1xPassword.name: h3cOnuDot1xPassword
h3cOnuDot1xPassword.description: ONU 802.1X password. The object should be set together with h3cOnuDot1xAccount.

h3cOnuPriorityQueueTable.name: h3cOnuPriorityQueueTable
h3cOnuPriorityQueueTable.description: This table contains specific information of priority queue.

h3cOnuQueueId.name: h3cOnuQueueId
h3cOnuQueueId.description: The queue ID of priority queue.

h3cOnuQueueSize.name: h3cOnuQueueSize
h3cOnuQueueSize.description: The size of priority queue, measured in percent. The total length of all priority queues is a constant, by default, it is assigned to all of the priority queues evenly. The length of each priority queue may be changed by changing the value of h3cOnuPriorityQueueSize. The total size of the inbound or outbound priority queues should be not more than 100.

h3cOnuCountTable.name: h3cOnuCountTable
h3cOnuCountTable.description: This table contains statistics of ONU port.

h3cOnuInCRCErrPkts.name: h3cOnuInCRCErrPkts
h3cOnuInCRCErrPkts.description: The total number of frames received with bad CRC checksum.

h3cOnuOutDroppedFrames.name: h3cOnuOutDroppedFrames
h3cOnuOutDroppedFrames.description: The total number of frames dropped because of buffer failure.

h3cOnuPriorityQueueSizeMinVal.name: h3cOnuPriorityQueueSizeMinVal
h3cOnuPriorityQueueSizeMinVal.description: The lower limit of queue size which is confined to h3cOnuQueueSize.

h3cOnuPriorityQueueSizeMaxVal.name: h3cOnuPriorityQueueSizeMaxVal
h3cOnuPriorityQueueSizeMaxVal.description: The upper limit of queue size which is confined to h3cOnuQueueSize.

h3cOnuUpdateByTypeNextIndex.name: h3cOnuUpdateByTypeNextIndex
h3cOnuUpdateByTypeNextIndex.description: Offer a free index of h3cOnuFirmwareUpdateByTypeTable.

h3cOnuQueueBandwidthTable.name: h3cOnuQueueBandwidthTable
h3cOnuQueueBandwidthTable.description: This table contains specific bandwidth information of ONU priority queue.

h3cOnuQueueMaxBandwidth.name: h3cOnuQueueMaxBandwidth
h3cOnuQueueMaxBandwidth.description: The maximum bandwidth of specific ONU priority queue, measured in 100Kbps.

h3cOnuQueueMaxBurstsize.name: h3cOnuQueueMaxBurstsize
h3cOnuQueueMaxBurstsize.description: The maximum burst size of specific ONU priority queue, measured in 64Bytes.

h3cOnuQueuePolicyStatus.name: h3cOnuQueuePolicyStatus
h3cOnuQueuePolicyStatus.description: true - enable bandwidth policy false - disable bandwidth policy The bandwidth administrative status of specific ONU priority queue.

h3cOnuIpAddress.name: h3cOnuIpAddress
h3cOnuIpAddress.description: The IP address assigned to the ONU.

h3cOnuIpAddressMask.name: h3cOnuIpAddressMask
h3cOnuIpAddressMask.description: The mask of IP address denoted by h3cOnuIpAddress.

h3cOnuIpAddressGateway.name: h3cOnuIpAddressGateway
h3cOnuIpAddressGateway.description: The gateway of IP address denoted by h3cOnuIpAddress.

h3cOnuDhcpallocate.name: h3cOnuDhcpallocate
h3cOnuDhcpallocate.description: true(1) - ONU auto allocate IP address status enable. false(2) - ONU auto allocate IP address status disable.

h3cOnuManageVID.name: h3cOnuManageVID
h3cOnuManageVID.description: The management VLAN of ONU denoted by h3cOnuManageVID.

h3cOnuManageVlanIntfS.name: h3cOnuManageVlanIntfS
h3cOnuManageVlanIntfS.description: The management interface status of ONU denoted by h3cOnuManageVlanIntfS.

h3cOnuChipSetInfoTable.name: h3cOnuChipSetInfoTable
h3cOnuChipSetInfoTable.description: ONU vendor specific information of ONU.

h3cOnuChipSetVendorId.name: h3cOnuChipSetVendorId
h3cOnuChipSetVendorId.description: Chipset vendor ID, which identifies the ONU's PON chip vendor according JEDEC ID code.

h3cOnuChipSetModel.name: h3cOnuChipSetModel
h3cOnuChipSetModel.description: Chip model, numbering(range from 0 to 0xFF) by the chip vendor.

h3cOnuCapabilityEntry.name: h3cOnuCapabilityEntry
h3cOnuCapabilityEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cOnuCapabilityTable.

h3cOnuServiceSupported.name: h3cOnuServiceSupported
h3cOnuServiceSupported.description: Services types supported by the ONU. These functional groups can be supported independently. geinterfacesupport - supporting (1)/not supporting(0) Gbit Ethernet GE interface. feinterfacesupport - supporting (1)/not supporting(0) 100M Ethernet FE interface.(maximum rate is 100M, without GEinterface) voipservicesupport - supporting (1)/not supporting(0)VoIP service. tdmservicesupport - supporting (1)/not supporting(0)TDM CES service.

h3cOnuGEPortNumber.name: h3cOnuGEPortNumber
h3cOnuGEPortNumber.description: The current gigabit ethernet ports number supported by the ONU.

h3cOnuFEPortNumber.name: h3cOnuFEPortNumber
h3cOnuFEPortNumber.description: the current fast ethernet ports number supported by the ONU.

h3cOnuPOTSPortNumber.name: h3cOnuPOTSPortNumber
h3cOnuPOTSPortNumber.description: The current POTS ports number supported by the ONU

h3cOnuE1PortsNumber.name: h3cOnuE1PortsNumber
h3cOnuE1PortsNumber.description: The current E1 ports number supported by the ONU.

h3cOnuUpstreamQueueNumber.name: h3cOnuUpstreamQueueNumber
h3cOnuUpstreamQueueNumber.description: The number of upstream queues supported by the ONU.

h3cOnuMaxUpstreamQueuePerPort.name: h3cOnuMaxUpstreamQueuePerPort
h3cOnuMaxUpstreamQueuePerPort.description: The number of maximum upstream queues per port of the ONU.

h3cOnuDownstreamQueueNumber.name: h3cOnuDownstreamQueueNumber
h3cOnuDownstreamQueueNumber.description: The number of downstream queues supported by the ONU.

h3cOnuMaxDownstreamQueuePerPort.name: h3cOnuMaxDownstreamQueuePerPort
h3cOnuMaxDownstreamQueuePerPort.description: The number of maximum downstream queues per port of the ONU.

h3cOnuBatteryBackup.name: h3cOnuBatteryBackup
h3cOnuBatteryBackup.description: true(1) - ONU supports a reserve battery. false(2) - ONU does not support a reserve battery.

h3cOnuIgspFastLeaveSupported.name: h3cOnuIgspFastLeaveSupported
h3cOnuIgspFastLeaveSupported.description: true(1) - ONU supports fast leave in igsp mode. false(2) - ONU does not support fast leave in igsp mode.

h3cOnuMCtrlFastLeaveSupported.name: h3cOnuMCtrlFastLeaveSupported
h3cOnuMCtrlFastLeaveSupported.description: true(1) - ONU supports fast leave in multicast control mode. false(2) - ONU does not support fast leave in multicast control mode.

h3cOnuDbaReportTable.name: h3cOnuDbaReportTable
h3cOnuDbaReportTable.description: This table defines the information of DBA(dynamic bandwidth allocation) report threshold contained in the MPCP report frames.

h3cOnuDbaReportEntry.name: h3cOnuDbaReportEntry
h3cOnuDbaReportEntry.description: The entry of the table h3cOnuDbaReportTable.

h3cOnuDbaReportThreshold.name: h3cOnuDbaReportThreshold
h3cOnuDbaReportThreshold.description: The threshold of the DBA report queue. the following is the queue ID and the related default threshold setting. 1 - 0 2 - 0 3 - 0 4 - 65535 5 - 65535 6 - 0 7 - 0 8 - 0

h3cOnuDbaReportStatus.name: h3cOnuDbaReportStatus
h3cOnuDbaReportStatus.description: enable -threshold configuration is active for the queue. disable -threshold configuration is not active for the queue.

h3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceTable.name: h3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceTable
h3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceTable.description: Table of map of the COS to local-precedence.

h3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceEntry.description: Configuration information of map of the COS to local precedence.

h3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceCosIndex.name: h3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceCosIndex
h3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceCosIndex.description: Index of the map, obtains from packet cos value.

h3cEponOnuStpPortEntry.name: h3cEponOnuStpPortEntry
h3cEponOnuStpPortEntry.description: Configuration information of ONU STP ports.

h3cEponStpPortIndex.name: h3cEponStpPortIndex
h3cEponStpPortIndex.description: The index of the STP ports.

h3cEponStpPortDescr.name: h3cEponStpPortDescr
h3cEponStpPortDescr.description: The description of the STP ports.

h3cEponStpPortState.name: h3cEponStpPortState
h3cEponStpPortState.description: The current state of the port (i.e. disabled, discarding, learning and forwarding).

h3cOnuPhysicalTable.name: h3cOnuPhysicalTable
h3cOnuPhysicalTable.description: This table is used for getting ONU physical information.

h3cOnuBridgeMac.name: h3cOnuBridgeMac
h3cOnuBridgeMac.description: The bridge MAC address of ONU.

h3cOnuFirstPonMac.name: h3cOnuFirstPonMac
h3cOnuFirstPonMac.description: The MAC address of ONU first PON port.

h3cOnuFirstPonRegState.name: h3cOnuFirstPonRegState
h3cOnuFirstPonRegState.description: The register state of ONU first PON port.

h3cOnuSecondPonMac.name: h3cOnuSecondPonMac
h3cOnuSecondPonMac.description: The MAC address of ONU second PON port.

h3cOnuSecondPonRegState.name: h3cOnuSecondPonRegState
h3cOnuSecondPonRegState.description: The register state of ONU second PON port.

h3cOnuSmlkTable.name: h3cOnuSmlkTable
h3cOnuSmlkTable.description: This table is used for getting ONU SMLK information.

h3cOnuSmlkGroupID.name: h3cOnuSmlkGroupID
h3cOnuSmlkGroupID.description: The SMLK group ID of ONU.

h3cOnuSmlkFirstPonRole.name: h3cOnuSmlkFirstPonRole
h3cOnuSmlkFirstPonRole.description: The role of ONU first PON port in a SMLK group.

h3cOnuSmlkFirstPonStatus.name: h3cOnuSmlkFirstPonStatus
h3cOnuSmlkFirstPonStatus.description: The transmitting status of ONU first PON port in a SMLK group.

h3cOnuSmlkSecondPonRole.name: h3cOnuSmlkSecondPonRole
h3cOnuSmlkSecondPonRole.description: The role of ONU second PON port in a SMLK group.

h3cOnuSmlkSecondPonStatus.name: h3cOnuSmlkSecondPonStatus
h3cOnuSmlkSecondPonStatus.description: The transmitting status of ONU second PON port in a SMLK group.

h3cOnuRS485DataBits.name: h3cOnuRS485DataBits
h3cOnuRS485DataBits.description: The port number of data bits in a character.

h3cOnuRS485Parity.name: h3cOnuRS485Parity
h3cOnuRS485Parity.description: The port sense of a character parity bit.

h3cOnuRS485StopBits.name: h3cOnuRS485StopBits
h3cOnuRS485StopBits.description: The port number of stop bits.

h3cOnuRS485FlowControl.name: h3cOnuRS485FlowControl
h3cOnuRS485FlowControl.description: The port type of input flow control. 'none' indicates no flow control at this level. 'hardware' indicates using hardware signals. 'xonOrxoff' indicates using software function.

h3cOnuRS485TXOctets.name: h3cOnuRS485TXOctets
h3cOnuRS485TXOctets.description: The number of output octets about the port. The unit is byte.

h3cOnuRS485RXOctets.name: h3cOnuRS485RXOctets
h3cOnuRS485RXOctets.description: The number of input octets about the port. The unit is byte.

h3cOnuRS485TXErrOctets.name: h3cOnuRS485TXErrOctets
h3cOnuRS485TXErrOctets.description: The number of output error octets about the port. The unit is byte.

h3cOnuRS485RXErrOctets.name: h3cOnuRS485RXErrOctets
h3cOnuRS485RXErrOctets.description: The number of input error octets about the port. The unit is byte.

h3cOnuRS485ResetStatistics.name: h3cOnuRS485ResetStatistics
h3cOnuRS485ResetStatistics.description: Reset the counters to zero, including h3cOnuRS485TXOctets, h3cOnuRS485RXOctets, h3cOnuRS485TXErrOctets and h3cOnuRS485RXErrOctets.

h3cOnuRS485SessionSummaryEntry.name: h3cOnuRS485SessionSummaryEntry
h3cOnuRS485SessionSummaryEntry.description: The entry of session summary table.

h3cOnuRS485SessionMaxNum.name: h3cOnuRS485SessionMaxNum
h3cOnuRS485SessionMaxNum.description: The max session number of every serial port which can be supported.

h3cOnuRS485SessionNextIndex.name: h3cOnuRS485SessionNextIndex
h3cOnuRS485SessionNextIndex.description: The next valid index used for creating a new session raw. When there is no valid index left, it will return 0.

h3cOnuRS485SessionTable.name: h3cOnuRS485SessionTable
h3cOnuRS485SessionTable.description: RS485 raw session table. Data received from RS485 will be sent to the destination by raw sockets.

h3cOnuRS485SessionType.name: h3cOnuRS485SessionType
h3cOnuRS485SessionType.description: The type of a session. A session can use UDP socket, TCP socket as a client, or TCP socket as a server.

h3cOnuRS485SessionAddType.name: h3cOnuRS485SessionAddType
h3cOnuRS485SessionAddType.description: This object indicates the transport type of the address contained in h3cOnuRS485SessionRemoteIP object.

h3cOnuRS485SessionRemoteIP.name: h3cOnuRS485SessionRemoteIP
h3cOnuRS485SessionRemoteIP.description: The IP of remote landing. When session type is 'udp', this is the peer IP. When session type is 'tcpClient', this is the server IP. When session type is 'tcpServer', this is invalid.

h3cOnuRS485SessionRemotePort.name: h3cOnuRS485SessionRemotePort
h3cOnuRS485SessionRemotePort.description: The port of remote landing. When session type is 'udp', this is the peer port. When session type is 'tcpClient', this is the server port. When session type is 'tcpServer', this is invalid.

h3cOnuRS485SessionLocalPort.name: h3cOnuRS485SessionLocalPort
h3cOnuRS485SessionLocalPort.description: Local socket port. When session type is 'udp', this is local UDP socket port. When session type is 'tcpClient', this is invalid. When session type is 'tcpServer', this is the local port which will be listened.

h3cOnuRS485SessionRowStatus.name: h3cOnuRS485SessionRowStatus
h3cOnuRS485SessionRowStatus.description: The status used for creating, modifying, and deleting instances of the columnar objects in raw session table.

h3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfoTable.name: h3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfoTable
h3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfoTable.description: Error information table. When failed to create a session, error information can be got from this table.

h3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfoEntry.name: h3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfoEntry
h3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfoEntry.description: The entry of error information table.

h3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfo.name: h3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfo
h3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfo.description: Error information string. When a response with 'noCreeation' for row creation in table h3cOnuRS485SessionTable, the error reason can be got from this object.

h3cEponBatchOperationBySlotTable.name: h3cEponBatchOperationBySlotTable
h3cEponBatchOperationBySlotTable.description: This table is used for batch operation by slot.

h3cEponBatchOperationBySlotType.name: h3cEponBatchOperationBySlotType
h3cEponBatchOperationBySlotType.description: The types of batch operation by slot: 1 - resetUnknown, the object value is not set. 9 - updateDba, update OLT DBA algorithm. Config the MIB object module h3cEponDbaUpdateFileName. 10 - updateONU, update ONU firmware. Config the MIB object module h3cEponOnuUpdateFileName with the filename of ONU firmware first.

h3cEponBatchOperationBySlotResult.name: h3cEponBatchOperationBySlotResult
h3cEponBatchOperationBySlotResult.description: The result of batch operation. 0xFFFF - other, general error. 1 - working, operation is not completed. 2 - successful, completed successfully. 3 - failed because the DBA source file does not exist. 4 - failed because the ONU firmware file does not exist. 5 - failed because of not set the filename of DBA source. 6 - failed because of not set the filename of ONU firmware. 7 - failed because of not set slottype.

h3cEponBatchOperationByOLTTable.name: h3cEponBatchOperationByOLTTable
h3cEponBatchOperationByOLTTable.description: This table is used for batch operation by OLT.

h3cEponBatchOperationByOLTType.name: h3cEponBatchOperationByOLTType
h3cEponBatchOperationByOLTType.description: The types of batch operation by OLT(operation for all ONUs in the OLT): 1 -- resetUnknown, the object value is not set. 5 -- updateONU, update ONU firmware. configure the MIB object module h3cEponOnuUpdateFileName with the filename of ONU firmware first.

h3cEponBatchOperationByOLTResult.name: h3cEponBatchOperationByOLTResult
h3cEponBatchOperationByOLTResult.description: The result of batch operation: 0xFFFF -- other, gernal error. 1 -- working, operation is not completed. 2 -- successful, operation completed successfully. 4 -- failed because the ONU firmware file does not exist. 6 -- failed because of not set the filename of ONU firmware. 7 -- failed because of not set olttype.

h3cOnuFirmwareUpdateByTypeTable.name: h3cOnuFirmwareUpdateByTypeTable
h3cOnuFirmwareUpdateByTypeTable.description: This table is used to update ONU by ONU type.

h3cOnuUpdateByOnuTypeIndex.name: h3cOnuUpdateByOnuTypeIndex
h3cOnuUpdateByOnuTypeIndex.description: The type and file relationship table entry index.

h3cOnuUpdateByTypeFileName.name: h3cOnuUpdateByTypeFileName
h3cOnuUpdateByTypeFileName.description: The file to be updated for the type of ONUs.

h3cOnuUpdateByTypeRowStatus.name: h3cOnuUpdateByTypeRowStatus
h3cOnuUpdateByTypeRowStatus.description: The status of this table entry. Only createAndGo and destroy actions are supported.

h3cEponOnuRegErrorMacAddr.name: h3cEponOnuRegErrorMacAddr
h3cEponOnuRegErrorMacAddr.description: The MAC of ONU registered error.

h3cOamEventLogType.name: h3cOamEventLogType
h3cOamEventLogType.description: The type of event that generated this entry in the event log.

h3cOamEventLogLocation.name: h3cOamEventLogLocation
h3cOamEventLogLocation.description: Whether this event occurred locally, or was received from the OAM peer via Ethernet OAM.

h3cEponLoopbackPortIndex.name: h3cEponLoopbackPortIndex
h3cEponLoopbackPortIndex.description: The index of port which generate loop back event.

h3cEponLoopbackPortDescr.name: h3cEponLoopbackPortDescr
h3cEponLoopbackPortDescr.description: A textual string containing information about the port generated loop back event.

h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisFrames.name: h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisFrames
h3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisFrames.description: the amount of mismatched frames about the LLID mismatch alarm.

h3cEponPortAlarmBerTrap.name: h3cEponPortAlarmBerTrap
h3cEponPortAlarmBerTrap.description: A h3cEponPortAlarmBerTrap notification is sent when a BER threshold crossing event is detected.

h3cEponPortAlarmFerTrap.name: h3cEponPortAlarmFerTrap
h3cEponPortAlarmFerTrap.description: A h3cEponPortAlarmFerTrap notification is sent when a frame error rate threshold crossing event is detected.

h3cEponErrorLLIDFrameTrap.name: h3cEponErrorLLIDFrameTrap
h3cEponErrorLLIDFrameTrap.description: A h3cEponErrorLLIDFrameTrap notification is sent when a LLID mismatched frames rate threshold crossing event is detected.

h3cEponLoopBackEnableTrap.name: h3cEponLoopBackEnableTrap
h3cEponLoopBackEnableTrap.description: A h3cEponLoopBackEnableTrap notification is sent when the loop back command is committed.

h3cEponOnuRegistrationErrTrap.name: h3cEponOnuRegistrationErrTrap
h3cEponOnuRegistrationErrTrap.description: A h3cEponOnuRegistrationErrTrap notification is sent when a ONU register failed.

h3cEponOamDisconnectionTrap.name: h3cEponOamDisconnectionTrap
h3cEponOamDisconnectionTrap.description: A h3cEponOamDisconnectionTrap notification is sent when LLID's OAM link is disconnected.

h3cEponEncryptionKeyErrTrap.name: h3cEponEncryptionKeyErrTrap
h3cEponEncryptionKeyErrTrap.description: A h3cEponEncryptionKeyErrTrap notification is sent when LLID's encryption key is bad.

h3cEponRemoteStableTrap.name: h3cEponRemoteStableTrap
h3cEponRemoteStableTrap.description: A h3cEponRemoteStableTrap notification is sent when remote Data Terminal Equipment(DTE) has not seen or is unsatisfied with local state information.

h3cEponLocalStableTrap.name: h3cEponLocalStableTrap
h3cEponLocalStableTrap.description: A h3cEponLocalStableTrap notification is sent when DTE has not seen or is unsatisfied with remote state information.

h3cEponOamVendorSpecificTrap.name: h3cEponOamVendorSpecificTrap
h3cEponOamVendorSpecificTrap.description: A h3cEponOamVendorSpecificTrap notification is sent when system vendor specific OAM alarm raised.

h3cEponSoftwareErrTrap.name: h3cEponSoftwareErrTrap
h3cEponSoftwareErrTrap.description: A h3cEponSoftwareErrTrap notification is sent when a PAS-SOFT internal error occurs.

h3cEponPortAlarmBerRecoverTrap.name: h3cEponPortAlarmBerRecoverTrap
h3cEponPortAlarmBerRecoverTrap.description: A h3cEponPortAlarmBerRecoverTrap notification is sent when a BER threshold crossing event is detected and then recovered.

h3cEponPortAlarmFerRecoverTrap.name: h3cEponPortAlarmFerRecoverTrap
h3cEponPortAlarmFerRecoverTrap.description: A h3cEponPortAlarmFerRecoverTrap notification is sent when a frame error rate threshold crossing event is detected and then recoverd.

h3cEponErrorLLIDFrameRecoverTrap.name: h3cEponErrorLLIDFrameRecoverTrap
h3cEponErrorLLIDFrameRecoverTrap.description: A h3cEponErrorLLIDFrameRecoverTrap notification is sent when a LLID mismatched frames rate threshold crossing event is detected and then recoverd.

h3cEponLoopBackEnableRecoverTrap.name: h3cEponLoopBackEnableRecoverTrap
h3cEponLoopBackEnableRecoverTrap.description: A h3cEponLoopBackEnableRecoverTrap notification is sent when the loop back is detected and then recoverd.

h3cEponOnuRegistrationErrRecoverTrap.name: h3cEponOnuRegistrationErrRecoverTrap
h3cEponOnuRegistrationErrRecoverTrap.description: A h3cEponOnuRegistrationErrRecoverTrap notification is sent when an ONU register failed and then register successful again.

h3cEponOamDisconnectionRecoverTrap.name: h3cEponOamDisconnectionRecoverTrap
h3cEponOamDisconnectionRecoverTrap.description: A h3cEponOamDisconnectionRecoverTrap notification is sent when LLID's OAM link is disconnected and then connected.

h3cEponEncryptionKeyErrRecoverTrap.name: h3cEponEncryptionKeyErrRecoverTrap
h3cEponEncryptionKeyErrRecoverTrap.description: A h3cEponEncryptionKeyErrRecoverTrap notification is sent when LLID's encryption key is bad and then right.

h3cEponRemoteStableRecoverTrap.name: h3cEponRemoteStableRecoverTrap
h3cEponRemoteStableRecoverTrap.description: A h3cEponRemoteStableRecoverTrap notification is sent when remote DTE has not seen or is unsatisfied with local state information and then is realized.

h3cEponLocalStableRecoverTrap.name: h3cEponLocalStableRecoverTrap
h3cEponLocalStableRecoverTrap.description: A h3cEponLocalStableRecoverTrap notification is sent when DTE has not seen or is unsatisfied with remote state information and then is realized.

h3cEponOamVendorSpecificRecoverTrap.name: h3cEponOamVendorSpecificRecoverTrap
h3cEponOamVendorSpecificRecoverTrap.description: A h3cEponOamVendorSpecificRecoverTrap notification is sent when system vendor specific OAM alarm is detected and then recovered.

h3cEponSoftwareErrRecoverTrap.name: h3cEponSoftwareErrRecoverTrap
h3cEponSoftwareErrRecoverTrap.description: A h3cEponSoftwareErrRecoverTrap notification is sent when a PAS-SOFT internal error is detected and then recovered.

h3cDot3OamThresholdRecoverEvent.name: h3cDot3OamThresholdRecoverEvent
h3cDot3OamThresholdRecoverEvent.description: A h3cDot3OamThresholdRecoverEvent notification is sent when h3cDot3OamThresholdEvent is detected and then recoverd.

h3cDot3OamNonThresholdRecoverEvent.name: h3cDot3OamNonThresholdRecoverEvent
h3cDot3OamNonThresholdRecoverEvent.description: A h3cDot3OamNonThresholdRecoverEvent notification is sent when h3cDot3OamNonThresholdEvent is detected and then recoverd.

h3cEponOnuRegExcessTrap.name: h3cEponOnuRegExcessTrap
h3cEponOnuRegExcessTrap.description: A h3cEponOnuRegExcessTrap notification is sent when the number of registered ONUs exceeds the limit.

h3cEponOnuRegExcessRecoverTrap.name: h3cEponOnuRegExcessRecoverTrap
h3cEponOnuRegExcessRecoverTrap.description: A h3cEponOnuRegExcessRecoverTrap notification is sent when h3cEponOnuRegExcessTrap is detected and then recoverd.

h3cEponOnuPowerOffTrap.name: h3cEponOnuPowerOffTrap
h3cEponOnuPowerOffTrap.description: A h3cEponOnuPowerOffTrap notification is sent when ONU is power off.

h3cEponOltSwitchoverTrap.name: h3cEponOltSwitchoverTrap
h3cEponOltSwitchoverTrap.description: A h3cEponOltSwithoverTrap notification is sent when OLT switchover is detected.

h3cEponOltDFETrap.name: h3cEponOltDFETrap
h3cEponOltDFETrap.description: A h3cEponOltDFETrap notification is sent when there was a serious problem(device fatal error) on OLT.

h3cEponOltDFERecoverTrap.name: h3cEponOltDFERecoverTrap
h3cEponOltDFERecoverTrap.description: A h3cEponOltDFERecoverTrap notification is sent when device fatal error is detected and then recoverd.

h3cEponOnuSilenceTrap.name: h3cEponOnuSilenceTrap
h3cEponOnuSilenceTrap.description: The h3cEponOnuSilenceTrap notification is sent when an unbound ONU try to register to an OLT.

h3cEponOnuSilenceRecoverTrap.name: h3cEponOnuSilenceRecoverTrap
h3cEponOnuSilenceRecoverTrap.description: The h3cEponOnuSilenceRecoverTrap notification is sent when a silent ONU is bound in the OLT or the aging onu mac address is timeout.

h3cEponOnuUpdateResultTrap.name: h3cEponOnuUpdateResultTrap
h3cEponOnuUpdateResultTrap.description: A h3cEponUpdateResultTrap notification is sent when an ONU reported its firmware update result.

h3cEponOnuAutoBindTrap.name: h3cEponOnuAutoBindTrap
h3cEponOnuAutoBindTrap.description: A h3cEponOnuAutoBindTrap notification is sent when a silent ONU is bound automatically.

h3cEponOnuPortStpStateTrap.name: h3cEponOnuPortStpStateTrap
h3cEponOnuPortStpStateTrap.description: A h3cEponOnuPortStpStateTrap notification is sent when a port turns into another state in STP environment.

h3cEponOnuLaserFailedTrap.name: h3cEponOnuLaserFailedTrap
h3cEponOnuLaserFailedTrap.description: A h3cEponOnuLaserFailedTrap notification is sent when an ONU has trouble with laser, such as laser constantly turned on, signal degradation or optics EOL (End of Life).

h3cOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap.name: h3cOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap
h3cOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap.description: A h3cOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap notification is sent when an ONU SMLK switchover is detected.

h3cEponStatTable.name: h3cEponStatTable
h3cEponStatTable.description: This table contains line code error statistics of epon port.

h3cEponStatFER.name: h3cEponStatFER
h3cEponStatFER.description: The frame error rate of epon port, measured in 1e-9 unit.

h3cEponStatBER.name: h3cEponStatBER
h3cEponStatBER.description: The bit error rate of epon port, measured in 1e-9 unit.
